root.name: Sherlock Holmes Consulting Detective: Volume II
root.description: Sherlock Holmes Consulting Detective Vol. 2 is a CD based Full Motion Video (FMV) game that uses film sequences to provide clues to various "cases". The player navigates a directory of names and locales to select relevent scenes to gain clues. These clues lead the player to new scenes until enough information has been gathered to "try the case" with the magistrate.

similar_games.game: Phoenix Wright: Ace Attorney - Justice For All
